quoutes.author: Nelson Mandela
quoutes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quoutes.author: Walt Disney
quoutes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quoutes.author: Steve Jobs
quoutes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma, which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

quoutes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quoutes.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.

quoutes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quoutes.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.

quoutes.author: James Cameron
quoutes.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

quoutes.author: John Lennon
quoutes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

quoutes.author: Mother Teresa
quoutes.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

quoutes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quoutes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

quoutes.author: Margaret Mead
quoutes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.

quoutes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quoutes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

quoutes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quoutes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quoutes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quoutes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

quoutes.author: Helen Keller
quoutes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

quoutes.author: Aristotle
quoutes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

quoutes.author: Anne Frank
quoutes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

quoutes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quoutes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quoutes.author: Maya Angelou
quoutes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

quoutes.author: Nelson Mandela
quoutes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quoutes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quoutes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

quoutes.author: Babe Ruth
quoutes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

quoutes.author: Helen Keller
quoutes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

quoutes.author: Thomas A. Edison
quoutes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

quoutes.author: Dr. Seuss
quoutes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

quoutes.author: Winston S. Churchill
quoutes.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quoutes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quoutes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quoutes.author: Walt Disney
quoutes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quoutes.author: Steve Jobs
quoutes.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.

quoutes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.
quoutes.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.

quoutes.author: Thomas Jefferson
quoutes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quoutes.author: Barack Obama
quoutes.quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.

quoutes.author: Wayne Gretzky
quoutes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

quoutes.author: Henry Ford
quoutes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

quoutes.author: Rosa Parks
quoutes.quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.

quoutes.author: Mother Teresa
quoutes.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.

quoutes.author: Audrey Hepburn
quoutes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, â€˜I'm possible!'

quoutes.author: Ayn Rand
quoutes.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

quoutes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quoutes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quoutes.author: Norman Vaughan
quoutes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.

quoutes.author: Beverly Sills
quoutes.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.

quoutes.author: Charles Swindoll
quoutes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.

quoutes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quoutes.quote: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.

quoutes.author: Sheryl Sandberg
quoutes.quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.

quoutes.author: Florence Nightingale
quoutes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.

quoutes.author: Vincent van Gogh
quoutes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.

quoutes.author: Napoleon Hill
quoutes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

quoutes.author: Aristotle
quoutes.quote: First, have a definite, clear practical ideal; a goal, an objective. Second, have the necessary means to achieve your ends; wisdom, money, materials, and methods. Third, adjust all your means to that end.

quoutes.author: Mark Twain
quoutes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So, throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
